response.overview: Skye Blue sees that her roommate, Cubbi Thompson, has forgotten to do her assigned chore yet AGAIN. Skye always gives Cubbi a 'punishment' every time she forgets to do a chore, but it doesn't really seem to help. . . probably because Cubbi loves every moment of being punished! Since Cubbi has neglected to do the laundry this time, Skye decides that the punishment should fit the crime. With that, Skye punishes Cubbi with laundry-themed rough sex, including stuffing used panties into Cubbi's mouth, and then using the panties to tie her hands together. Now THAT should teach her!
response.title: Laundry Day
